text: Alan David Hansen (born 13 June 1955) is a Scottish former footballer and BBC television football pundit. He played as a central defender. He played for Partick Thistle, Liverpool and the Scotland national team. He co-hosted Match of the Day from 1992 to 2014. Hansen was born in Sauchie, Clackmannanshire. ==Honours== Partick Thistle *Scottish First Division: 1975–76] Liverpool *First Division: 1978–79, 1979–80, 1981–82, 1982–83, 1983–84, 1985–86, 1987–88, 1989–90 *FA Cup: 1985–86, 1988–89 *League Cup: 1980–81, 1981–82, 1982–83, 1983–84 *FA Charity Shield: 1977 (shared), 1979, 1980, 1982, 1986 (shared), 1989 *Football League Super Cup: 1986 *European Cup: 1977–78, 1980–81, 1983–84 *UEFA Super Cup: 1977 Individual *PFA First Division Team of the Year: 1981–82, 1982–83, 1983–84, 1986–87, 1987–88, 1989–90 *PFA Team of the Century (1907 to 2007): **Team of the Century (1977–1996) **Overall Team of the Century *English Football Hall of Fame: 2006 *Scottish Football Hall of Fame: 2007 *Football League 100 Legends ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Association football broadcasters Category:BBC radio presenters Category:BBC television presenters Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scottish television presenters
title: Alan Hansen
